extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware to Fixed Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the firmware to the fixed version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Reactivate MAC Address Filter
extracted_playbook.description: Reactivate the MAC Address Filter after restart to ensure it is working.

extracted_playbook.title: Test MAC Address Filter Functionality
extracted_playbook.description: Add a test-client to the MAC Address Filter list, enable it, and check if access to the web-based management is blocked via the test-client.

cve_id: WAGO PFC100/PFC200 and Touch Panel 600 Vulnerability
